fixes_applied: FIX2: flat forecast detector with season-aware explanation
FIX3: per-market IQR outlier filter (fence=2.5) before training
FIX4: top-5 market list limited to ≤60d old data with freshness tags

season_notes.kharif_arrival: peaks Dec — Nov-Jan glut, prices near MSP
season_notes.lean_preKharif: peaks Sep — highest price window Aug-Oct
season_notes.lean_interseason: peaks Feb-Mar — mild uptick between seasons

season_notes.harvest_rain_risk: peaks Nov — wet grain quality discount
season_notes.jan_drying_delay: peaks Jan — cold delays drying → low arrivals
